name: Beauty Salon
synopsis: Did you get to learn fashion with Fashion Designer? Try now to be a cosmetics star with Beauty Salon! Experiment with eye shadows and makeup, learn how to do hairstyles, manicures and massages but most importantly: keep your clients happy! Will you become a star in the world of cosmetics? Learn all types of beauty treatments. Expand your salon, unlocking new treatments. Show all your talent and win trophies for your living room.
